english.segment1: Ashes, ashes we fall down. It always feels too soon. But when we walk on golden ground. All will be made new
english.segment2: Hallelujah. Hallelujah ah ah. Hallelujah ah ah ah ah ah ah. All will be made new
english.segment3: Life is but a dream at best. Morning's coming soon. Kingdom come will bring us rest. All will be made new
english.segment4: Hallelujah. Hallelujah ah ah. Hallelujah ah ah ah ah ah ah. All will be made new
english.segment5: All sorrows inside. Will fade away into the night. And all will be made new
english.segment6: Hallelujah. Hallelujah ah ah. Hallelujah ah ah ah ah ah ah. All will be made new
